name: Swift Electricity Access
title: Fastest Electrical Connection Setup
description: In 2019, Jordan achieved a remarkable feat by reducing the time to obtain an electrical connection to just 3.8 days, showcasing its efficiency in infrastructure development.

name: High Tertiary Education Investment
title: Significant Investment in Higher Education
description: In 2021, Jordan allocated 36.47% of its total expenditure in tertiary public institutions to current education expenditure, highlighting its commitment to advancing higher education.

name: Child Labor Concerns
title: High Child Employment in Agriculture
description: In 2016, 40.93% of economically active male children aged 7-14 were employed in agriculture, indicating a significant reliance on child labor in this sector.

name: Unpaid Family Work
title: Predominance of Unpaid Family Work Among Children
description: In 2016, a staggering 97.3% of female children in employment aged 7-14 were unpaid family workers, reflecting a high level of unpaid labor among young girls.

name: Child Labor in Manufacturing
title: Significant Child Employment in Manufacturing
description: In 2016, 17.53% of male children aged 7-14 were employed in manufacturing, highlighting the sector's reliance on child labor.

name: Advanced Education Unemployment
title: High Unemployment Among Educated Males
description: In 2023, 20.65% of the male labor force with advanced education faced unemployment, indicating challenges in job creation for educated individuals.

name: Minimal Low-Elevation Land
title: Negligible Land Below 5 Meters Elevation
description: In 2015, only 0.004% of Jordan's total land area was below 5 meters in elevation, minimizing risks related to sea-level rise.
